channel.title: 508/525 KBD Bug
channel.description: Everytime i attack kbd, i get this error on the server runner and i log out of client. [code] Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4694 at net.com.codeusa.world.clipInfo.checkPos(clipInfo.java:15) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.update.NPCMovement.getNextNPCMovement(NPCMovemen t.java:57) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendPlayerFollowing(NpcCombat .java:1898) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendAttackPlayer(NpcCombat.ja va:85) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.NPC.process(NPC.java:424) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:236) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]

item.title: 508/525 KBD Bug
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Everytime i attack kbd, i get this error on the server runner and i log out of client.

Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4694 at net.com.codeusa.world.clipInfo.checkPos(clipInfo.java:15) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.update.NPCMovement.getNextNPCMovement(NPCMovemen t.java:57) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendPlayerFollowing(NpcCombat .java:1898) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.combat.NpcCombat.appendAttackPlayer(NpcCombat.ja va:85) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.NPC.process(NPC.java:424) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:236) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
